alert.note: Alert for Gove; Sheridan (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 18 at 4:17AM CST until January 19 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Wind chill readings as low as 20 below zero tonight and Friday morning. * WHERE...Sheridan and Gove Counties. * WHEN...Sunset this evening to noon CST Friday. * IMPACTS...Increased potential for frostbite and hypothermia. Frostbite may occur on exposed skin in less than 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The coldest wind chill readings are expected to occur around sunrise Friday morning.
info.instruction: Use caution when traveling outside. Make sure to wear appropriate clothing. Dress in multiple layers, including a hat and gloves.
